title: attempting to connect DC ALL ARVO!
body:
GG RIOT lost 2 games because I dc like 10 times a game 

well played well played!

replies.body:
Hi,

Sorry to hear you're having issues -  do you normally get DCs when you play?  What ISP are you with?

It might be worth checking your recent game logs using something like [Logs of Lag](http://logsoflag.com/) and look for signs of packet loss. 

Also - try running a trace route to the game servers (the IP to use is 103.240.227.1) to see if there are any issues with the connection between you and them.

Let me know how you go.

Cheers
Mindstar
